itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Tiger Woods winning The Masters, the NHL Playoffs and our predictions for the Stanley Cup, Chris Davis finally breaking his MLB hitless streak, Russell Wilson getting a new deal, and the first round of the NBA playoffs.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Tiger Woods winning The Masters, the NHL Playoffs and our predictions for the Stanley Cup, Chris Davis finally breaking his MLB hitless streak, Russell Wilson getting a new deal, and the first round of the NBA playoffs.
